程序包 com.google.typography.font.tools.fontinfo

类 DataDisplayTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.typography.font.tools.fontinfo.DataDisplayTable
  • public class DataDisplayTable
extends java.lang.Object
    A row-oriented table of strings with labeled columns that is intended to be displayed by an application.
    作者:
    Han-Wen Yeh

      Enum representing the alignment of the text when being displayed

    • 构造器详细资料

      • DataDisplayTable

        public DataDisplayTable​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> header)
        Constructor. Creates an empty table with the given header labels. The number of columns is the size of the header array, which cannot be changed after initialisation.
        参数:
        header - the header columns of the table

    • 方法详细资料

      • setAlignment

        public void setAlignment​(java.util.List<DataDisplayTable.Align> alignment)
        Sets display alignment of each table column.
        参数:
        alignment - array of values for each column alignment
        抛出:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if array size is different from column count

      • add

        public void add​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> row)
        Inserts a row of data into the table.
        参数:
        row - the row of data to insert into the table
        抛出:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if array size is different from column

      • getDisplayAlignment

        public java.util.List<DataDisplayTable.Align> getDisplayAlignment()
        返回:
        the alignment of each column

      • prettyString

        public java.lang.String prettyString()
        Gets a string representation of the table. This string contains the header in the first line, a line for a separator, and each row of data in a new line. The width of each column is set so that the largest element in each column can fit into he column. Column alignment for printing can also be set in the setAlignment method.

        This function may run slowly for larger tables due to potential memory issues, and it is suggested that the function prettyPrint be used in the case of printing large tables to the console.

        返回:
        a string representation of the table.

      • prettyPrint

        public void prettyPrint()
        Prints the data represented by the table to the terminal. The format of the output is: The header in the first line, a separator in the second line, and each row of the data is in a new line afterwards. The width of each column is set so that the largest element in each column can fit into he column. Column alignment for printing can also be set in the setAlignment method.

      • csvString

        public java.lang.String csvString()
        Gets the table as a string of comma-separated values
        返回:
        a CSV string that represents the table

      • csvStringArray

        public java.lang.String[] csvStringArray()
        Gets the table as an array of strings, where each string is a row in the table as comma-separated values. This allows for the appending of additional values to each row before serialising to a CSV file
        返回:
        an array of CSV strings

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        覆盖:
        toString 在类中 java.lang.Object
